main_definition: A term often used to describe explicit sexual content, typically in the form of films or images.

meanings_and_examples.example: He watched a pornographic movie last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The industry that produces and distributes such materials
meanings_and_examples.example: Pornography is a controversial subject in many societies due to its impact on culture and morality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal or slang term used by some people to refer to sexually explicit content, often without the intention of being offensive
meanings_and_examples.example: I don't like when people use 'porn' as a casual word for adult content.

meanings_and_examples.definition: 'Porn-o'-meter', an informal term sometimes used to refer to software that detects or blocks access to explicit materials
meanings_and_examples.example: My computer has a porno-ometer installed, so it won't let me watch any adult content.

meanings_and_examples.definition: 'Pornographic material', an objective description of sexually explicit media without the casual connotation
meanings_and_examples.example: The website sells various forms of pornographic material.
